tool_description: Capoom OPUS aims to streamline the process of creating procedural models and generating synthetic data. It offers a comprehensive pipeline that handles the entire creation process, encompassing both 3D model generation and the subsequent generation of synthetic data based on those models. The advantage of OPUS is that it allows developers to request data without requiring any expertise in 3D modeling software.
name: OPUS
title: OPUS

api_list.name: Get Job results
api_list.description: Monitor the status of the jobs initiated by create structure or create compnent endpoints. Job ID is obtained once either Create Component, or Create Structure endpoints are called.

api_list.name: Get All Models Names
api_list.description: Returns all the names of the structures and components currently provided by Capoom
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://opus5.p.rapidapi.com/get_model_names"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "opus5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://opus5.p.rapidapi.com/get_model_names"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "opus5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Attributes of a Model
api_list.description:
Returns all attributes of the given structure or component.

These attributes are all the **classifications**, **parameters** and

 **advanced parameters** of the structure

api_list.name: Variate Opus Result
